title: IBM and The Weather Channel launch detailed local COVID   maps and data tracking
description: There are already a number of resources available for mapping the spread of confirmed COVID   cases both in the U S  and globally  but IBM and its subsidiary The Weather Company have launched new tools that bring COVID   mapping and analysis to more people
content: There are already a number of resources available for mapping the spread of confirmed COVID   cases both in the U S  and globally  but IBM and its subsidiary The Weather Company have launched new tools that bring COVID   mapping and analysis to more people     chars
